snippet.title: ３２：Shikon-X Astro Defense Fortress
snippet.description: Shikon-X is a Graphic Adventure Game that follows the adventures of Major Daaia, who pilots Shikon-X, a transformable mecha.The game features different gameplay styles, the mentioned Graphic Adventure Game (like Monkey Island and Thimbleweed Park) and also many arcade-style minigames, and even pinball!This is a story outline:In the future, earth scientists discovered a way to generate unlimited free energy, which needed to be encapsulated and kept in orbit. This event kick-started a new golden era of technological advances, interstellar travel and even the first contacts with alien civilizations.One of those was the Rolars, who came looking to steal the energy capsules. For centuries they had been timidly trying, but rarely getting what they wanted...However, recently their attacks have been increasing in number and viciousness, even reaching Earth and sometimes killing thousands of people, leaving hundreds of orphans behind.The Federation decided to adopt all those orphans and, from the moment they could walk, train them in engineering, tactics, combat and piloting.Major Daaia was one of those children. Her entire childhood and teenage years were spent training in simulators.Today is the day she'll finally see real combat for the first time...
